Suggestions for Improvement:
-Continuously monitor and address any problems with cleanliness, as any issue can quickly lead to customers dissatisfaction. 
-Create more interactive amenities, such as restaurants, fitness centers and other attractions that can draw visitors to the property.
-Update locations, such as adding scenic areas or attractions, to make the area more attractive to visitors.
-Emphasize customer service by providing friendly and courteous staff members and responding quickly to customer issues.
-Improve the overall value of the product by discounting prices and providing special offers to build customer loyalty.
-Publicize special events and promotions to attract more customers in the area.
